title: A Gift Worth Sharing
description: Spend a weekend with Nate and Kyle from A Masterâ€™s Love. The holidays have arrived and Kyle can't wait to get away with his lover. What he doesn't know is that Nate has a special surprise waiting at their destination. As old memories of a failed attempt of a threesome surface, Kyle's determined to face them. But will it strengthen their relationship or break what they've been building for the last two years?
author: Marty Rayne
